algorithm_technique: Dijkstra's algorithm to find shortest paths from each city, then calculate total cost.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate minimum cost to buy an apple in any city and return to start, with increased road costs on return.
problem_summary_technical: Run Dijkstra from each city to find shortest travel to all other cities. Combine travel cost, apple cost, and return cost.
key_insights: The problem requires finding the shortest path from each city to all other cities.
Dijkstra's algorithm is suitable for finding these shortest paths.
The return trip cost multiplier needs to be applied to the outbound travel cost.
